entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
